schema.name: 2018/09/24 Lunch
recipeIngredient: 1 roll, Steamed Bean Curd Roll With Pork and Veg

recipeInstructions.text: Boil the egg to your preferred doneness, then peel and set aside.
Wash the grapes and tangerines, then set aside.
Season the lean ground pork with your choice of herbs and spices.
Cook the seasoned ground pork in a pan over medium heat for about 10 minutes, until fully cooked.
Prepare the steamed bean curd roll according to package instructions.
Wash the lettuce iceberg and chop it for the salad base.
Assemble the salad by placing the chopped lettuce on a plate, topping it with the cooked ground pork, and adding the steamed bean curd roll slices. Garnish with the salad topper.
Serve the prepared egg, grapes, and tangerines on the side to complete your nutritious lunch.

schema.description: This '2018/09/24 Lunch' recipe is a perfect blend of high-protein and low-sodium ingredients, making it an ideal choice for anyone looking to enjoy healthy, nutritious meals without compromising on taste. Featuring a combination of fresh fruits, lean ground pork, steamed bean curd roll, and crisp iceberg lettuce, this lunch is not only healthy but also delicious and satisfying.
